text: "Good-bye, Dai," said Morfydd, smiling from the bottom step."Good-bye, Morfydd." He sought to enfold her in his arms. But he was too late. She was already up the window. And Dai, on the pavement, knowing in his heart that Morfydd was leaving. him as surely as she was leaving Dinas..
handwritten_text: "Good-bye, Dai," said Morfydd, smiling from the bottom step."Good-bye, Morfydd." He sought to enfold her in his arms. But he was too late. She was already up the window. And Dai, on the pavement, knowing in his heart that Morfydd was leaving. him as surely as she was leaving Dinas..
